TopicTitle: What's up all, I am Chaos_Evolved

Articles.Content: And I just got back from Eeloo . Took 61 years game time (50 of that was the return... I really did not know the most efficient way back, and kept fine-tuning my orbit with the ion engine till I finally hit Kerbin). If anyone has any recommended links for interplanetary tutorials / tips, etc, I could sure use it. I don't use mods, so no mods please.

Hello Chaos_Evolved. What sort of trouble were you having with the transit? There are a couple of nice non-mod calculators that can tell you what sort of burn you need to get from place to place.

http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/

http://ksp.olex.biz/

Hi! Welcome aboard!

Poor Kerbonaut(s)(if it isn't a probe), had to be in space for 61 years.
